Ingredients.1: 1 (16 ounce) package whole white button mushrooms

Ingredients.4: 0.25 cup finely shredded sharp Cheddar cheese

Directions.1: Using a damp cloth, gently clean mushrooms. Remove stems and discard.

Directions.2: Mince scallions and separate white and green parts.

Directions.3: Preheat an air fryer to 360 degrees F (182 degrees C).

Directions.4: Combine cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, the white parts from the scallions, paprika, and salt in a small bowl. Stuff filling into the mushrooms, pressing it in to fill the cavity with the back of a small spoon.

Directions.5: Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray and set mushrooms inside. Depending on the size of your air fryer, you may have to do 2 batches.

Directions.6: Cook mushrooms until filling is lightly browned, about 8 minutes. Repeat with remaining mushrooms.

Directions.7: Sprinkle mushrooms with scallion greens and let cool for 5 minutes before serving.
